servicesPage.title: Our Services
servicesPage.subtitle: Professional and reliable financial consultancy services

service1.title: Real Estate Consultancy
service1.description: Consultancy in the accommodation sector, housing selection, legal guidance for contracts, deposits, and notary procedures.

service2.title: Residence Permit (Permesso di Soggiorno) Consultancy
service2.description: Complete preparation of documents (contract, insurance, proof of income, etc.), scheduling an appointment at the police headquarters (Questura), filling out the postal kit, and tracking the application.

service3.title: Student Scholarship Application Consultancy
service3.description: Scanning for state, regional, and private scholarship opportunities suitable for your profile, converting application calendars and requirements into a scholarship application timeline, preparing and checking CVs, motivation letters, income documents, and references, submitting applications via online portals, and monitoring results.

service4.title: Company Formation and Closure
service4.description: Establishment of limited and joint-stock companies, company closure procedures, and liquidation processes.

service5.title: Financial Consultancy Services
service5.description: Financial planning, budgeting, and management consultancy services.

service6.title: Welcome Service
service6.description: Airport reception & private transfer (individual/student groups), City orientation: public transport card, SIM card, essential points of interest, Emergency support line for the first few days (lost items, health, language assistance), Organization of tours and guidance based on specific requests.

metadata.title: Alvolo Consulting Consultancy
metadata.description: Reliable chartered accountancy and consultancy services in Ankara since 1995. Professional solutions for your tax, accounting, and consultancy needs.
metadata.keywords: chartered accountant, SMMM, tax consultancy, accounting, Ankara, financial consultancy, Alvolo Consulting Consultancy

heroSection.subheading1: Reliable bureaucracy and real estate consultancy services in Italy
heroSection.subheading2: Professional solutions for all your needs.

aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.paragraph1: As Alvolo Consulting Consultancy, we have been providing chartered accountancy and consultancy services in Ankara since 1995.
aboutSection.paragraph2: We work to provide the best service to our clients with our experienced team.
aboutSection.paragraph3: By closely following professional developments and changing legislation, we provide our clients with up-to-date and accurate information.
